strapiPost.title: Electronic Music Experience Coming To The Momentary
strapiPost.content:
Dive into the digital music scene during Momentous, a four-day experience of electronic sound and art at the Momentary in Bentonville this week, Oct 20-24. 

  • Sounds: The first three nights will feature big names from the world of electronic music like Phong Tran, Four Tet, and Grammy-nominated Arca; then, a free show featuring local electronic artists will conclude the event on Sunday. 
  • Sights: Immerse yourself in a labyrinth-like sound sculpture, Rage Fluids by Hannah Perry, or the meditative environment, SUB by Kurt Hentschl√§ger. 

Reserve your tickets for each night of Momentous HERE.
